channel.title: Vinoth Babu Rants
channel.description: Recent content on Vinoth Babu Rants

item.title: The last superstar
item.description: Today’s stars are commodities stocked in a chain of supermarkets. They can never be superstar. We all like Rajinikanth more because he’s one of us — richer and more known, yes, and yet like us in the ways that matter.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Hello! You’re probably here because you want to talk; there are a couple of ways to get in touch with me.

item.title: Who Am I
item.description: In short, my name is Vinoth babu Mahadevan from Chennai, RajiniKanth fan.I am avid football and chess player. Some of my thoughts:
